title: Gulf Islands National Seashore: Bookstore
body: Bookstore         Staff members sell books and merchandise to enhance park visits. NPS  Eastern National operates three sales outlets at Gulf Islands National Seashore, at Fort Pickens Visitor Center, Fort Barrancas Visitor Center, and at Davis Bayou Visitor Center. Bookstores sell orientation, history, and natural history books and other merchandise that enhance park visits and future ones.  Eastern National, a 501(c)3 cooperating association and eParks.com, its e-commerce website, was formed to support the educational, interpretive and conservation programs of the National Park Service.  Over the years, our donations have funded special events, signage for trails and exhibits, publications, interpretive programs, research grants, internships, the purchase of historical artifacts, park programs for kids, reenactments, interpretive exhibits and much more. To date, Eastern National has donated over $95 million to support the national parks.
